name: EventHubs Cleaner
description: A more comprehensive style to remove advertisements and junk on eventhubs.com
additional_info:
(Optionally) disable adblock on eventhubs.com and let this style remove the junk for you without incurring the obnoxious nag screen. If using adblock as well, be sure to have the "Adblock Warning Removal List" filter enabled. I created this when other styles available for this site stopped working.

Simply using css is a more passive method to ad removal which cannot be detected or circumvented as easily. A more aggressive alternative is to use the greasemonkey script Anti-AdBlock Killer by Reek available here: https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/735-anti-adblock-killer-reek

Like this style?
